A collection of legacy interfaces for querying information about the current executing process. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

Provides a library for accessing information about this process and other processes on the operating system.

Also provides means of spawning subprocess for commands. The design of this library is modeled after the proposed design of the Boost.Process library, and is design specifically to follow the style of standard libraries and potentially become a proposal for a standard library.

This file declares the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process">llvm::sys::Process</a> class which contains a collection of legacy static interfaces for extracting various information about the current process. The goal is to migrate users of this API over to the new interfaces.

<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This functions ensures that the standard file descriptors (input, output,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and error) are properly mapped to a file descriptor before we use any of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// them.  This should only be called by standalone programs, library</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// components should not call this.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#aafb9f9b515200177db8c2bde7e02c4b3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::error&#95;code <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#aafb9f9b515200177db8c2bde7e02c4b3">FixupStandardFileDescriptors</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function safely closes a file descriptor.  It is not safe to retry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// close(2) when it returns with errno equivalent to EINTR; this is because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42;nixen cannot agree if the file descriptor is, in fact, closed when this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// occurs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// N.B. Some operating systems, due to thread cancellation, cannot properly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// guarantee that it will or will not be closed one way or the other!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a0777b5060c78b24c4765fffbac259f93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::error&#95;code <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a0777b5060c78b24c4765fffbac259f93">SafelyCloseFileDescriptor</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FD);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function determines if the standard input is connected directly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to a user&#39;s input (keyboard probably), rather than coming from a file</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// or pipe.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#ad2aac231a0752ab9d6c3d7bae48f7adc"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#ad2aac231a0752ab9d6c3d7bae48f7adc">StandardInIsUserInput</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function determines if the standard output is connected to a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &quot;tty&quot; or &quot;console&quot; window. That is, the output would be displayed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the user rather than being put on a pipe or stored in a file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#ab2af58ec26c804a6836864d970c78df1"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#ab2af58ec26c804a6836864d970c78df1">StandardOutIsDisplayed</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function determines if the standard error is connected to a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &quot;tty&quot; or &quot;console&quot; window. That is, the output would be displayed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the user rather than being put on a pipe or stored in a file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a30f5096a2364f58d967775a553c1143b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a30f5096a2364f58d967775a553c1143b">StandardErrIsDisplayed</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function determines if the given file descriptor is connected to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// a &quot;tty&quot; or &quot;console&quot; window. That is, the output would be displayed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the user rather than being put on a pipe or stored in a file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a2bd9c876be050d32ff622ef5b562bb4e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a2bd9c876be050d32ff622ef5b562bb4e">FileDescriptorIsDisplayed</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> fd);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function determines if the given file descriptor is displayd and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// supports colors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a6c753dc2ccb8b41c097dee19f3690e0d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a6c753dc2ccb8b41c097dee19f3690e0d">FileDescriptorHasColors</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> fd);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function determines the number of columns in the window</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// if standard output is connected to a &quot;tty&quot; or &quot;console&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// window. If standard output is not connected to a tty or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// console, or if the number of columns cannot be determined,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// this routine returns zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#ab21a24de36e15ce39ddb32192ff723ef"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#ab21a24de36e15ce39ddb32192ff723ef">StandardOutColumns</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function determines the number of columns in the window</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a89927683c57b686c4694bbc0ee822653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a89927683c57b686c4694bbc0ee822653">StandardErrColumns</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function determines whether the terminal connected to standard</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a2512fe676260dcee1c2ba5e917dad4aa"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a2512fe676260dcee1c2ba5e917dad4aa">StandardOutHasColors</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function determines whether the terminal connected to standard</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Enables or disables whether ANSI escape sequences are used to output</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// colors. This only has an effect on Windows.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note: Setting this option is not thread-safe and should only be done</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// during initialization.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a6f01fd2553456500f600d83db62c6932"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a6f01fd2553456500f600d83db62c6932">UseANSIEscapeCodes</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> enable);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Whether changing colors requires the output to be flushed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is needed on systems that don&#39;t support escape sequences for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// changing colors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#ae688bc9ea544596962674ee94437ec00"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#ae688bc9ea544596962674ee94437ec00">ColorNeedsFlush</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function returns the colorcode escape sequences.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If ColorNeedsFlush() is true then this function will change the colors</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and return an empty escape sequence. In that case it is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// responsibility of the client to flush the output stream prior to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// calling this function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a17881ed9155bdf983b849c4c69c365b0"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a17881ed9155bdf983b849c4c69c365b0">OutputColor</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> c, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> bold, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> bg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Same as OutputColor, but only enables the bold attribute.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function returns the escape sequence to reverse forground and</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Resets the terminals colors, or returns an escape sequence to do so.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a92b058c34d04f6d0adf6eac3060343c6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a92b058c34d04f6d0adf6eac3060343c6">GetRandomNumber</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Equivalent to ::exit(), except when running inside a CrashRecoveryContext.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// In that case, the control flow will resume after RunSafely(), like for a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// crash, rather than exiting the current process.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Use \\arg NoCleanup for calling &#95;exit() instead of exit().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#91;&#91;noreturn&#93;&#93; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process/#a38ee110d150d9b436e4d01405bd7f1a9">Exit</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RetCode, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NoCleanup = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
